devdoc.author: Cooper Labs
devdoc.details: This contract is an authorized fork of Angle's `SettersGovernor` contract https://github.com/AngleProtocol/angle-transmuter/blob/main/contracts/monetizer/facets/SettersGovernor.sol

SafeCastOverflowedUintDowncast(uint8,uin.details: Value doesn't fit in an uint of `bits` size.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

addCollateral(address).details: Collateral assets with a fee on transfer are not supported by the system

adjustStablecoins(address,uint128,bool).details: The amount passed here must be an absolute amount

changeAllowance(address,address,uint256).details: This function can typically be used to grant allowance to a newly added manager for it to pull the funds associated to the collateral it corresponds to

recoverERC20(address,address,address,uin.details: No check is made on the collateral that is redeemed: this function could typically be used by a governance during a manual rebalance of the reserves of the system`collateral` is different from `token` only in the case of a managed collateral

revokeCollateral(address,bool).details: Require `collatInfo.normalizedStables == 0`, that is to say that the collateral is not used to back stablesThe system may still have a non null balance of the collateral that is revoked: this should later be handled through a recoverERC20 callFunds needs to have been withdrew from the manager prior to this call if `checkExternalManagerBalance` is true

setCollateralManager(address,bool,(addre.details: Funds need to have been withdrawn from the eventual previous manager prior to this call

devdoc.title: SettersGovernor

addCollateral(address).notice: Add `collateral` as a supported collateral in the system

adjustStablecoins(address,uint128,bool).notice: Adjusts the amount of stablecoins issued from `collateral` by `amount`

changeAllowance(address,address,uint256).notice: Sets the allowance of the contract on `token` for `spender` to `amount`

recoverERC20(address,address,address,uin.notice: Recovers `amount` of `token` from the Monetizer contract

setAccessManager(address).notice: Sets a new access manager address

setOracle(address,bytes).notice: Sets the `oracleConfig` used to read the value of `collateral` for the mint, burn and redemption operations

setWhitelistStatus(address,uint8,bytes).notice: Changes whether a `collateral` can only be handled during burns and redemptions by whitelisted addresses and sets the data used to read into the whitelist

toggleTrusted(address,uint8).notice: Changes the trusted status for `sender` when for selling rewards or updating the normalizer

updateOracle(address).notice: Update oracle data for a given `collateral`
